title: 2bedrm+Den/2Bathroom duplex near southport
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Rarely available.  2bedroom+Den (that could be used as a closetless bedroom)/2 Bathroom Duplex apartment   Steps away from Southport Corridor, Wrigley Field, Southport Brownline stop, Whole Foods, and everything else you could possible want is a vintage duplex apartment on the top floor of a walk up 3flat.  Located on Henderson - a quiet, tree-lined street.  Available to rent for August 1st.    Open floor plan.   Washer and Dryer in unit Dogs ok. Window A/Cs provided for and maintained by owner do a nice job cooling the place One garage spot available for $165  Owner managed apartment.  Call John at 312-909-1025 to set up showing.
